name: 蔡銘修
objective: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
schedule:
01 02/23 Intro(research topic)
02 03/01 Prospectus
03 03/08 Endnote
04 03/15 Writing Summaries-1
05 03/22 Writing Summaries-2
06 03/29 Research Introduction-1
07 04/05 no class
08 04/12 Research Introduction-2(turn in Introduction)
09 04/19 Midterm Week
10 04/26 Research Literature Review(turn in Literature Review)
11 05/03 Research Method-1
12 05/10 Research Method-2(turn in Method)
13 05/17 Research Result and Discussion-1(turn in Result)
14 05/24 Research Conclusion
15 05/31 Final Presentation-1(check Literature Database)
16 06/07 Conference Week
17 06/14 Final Presentation-2
18 06/21 Final Exam Week (final paper due)
scorePolicy:
Grading:
1. Attendance 10%
2. In Class Assignments 20%
3. Final Presentation 20%
4. Literature Database 5%
5. Final Research Paper 35%
6. Submission Proof for a Journal or Conference. 10%
